name: Iesabel
summary: In the times of darkness, only the mightiest of heroes can save the world. Stand out against the evil all by yourself in epic single player mode. Swarms of bloodthirsty monsters, loads of epic gear to collect, dozens of skills to obtain. Grab your sword and fling yourself into action now!

name: I Expect You to Die
summary: I Expect You To Die is a virtual reality puzzle game that places you in the well-polished shoes of an elite secret agent. You must attempt to survive deadly situations in immersive, dangerous locales.

name: Ie Naki Ko - Suzu no Sentaku
summary: TV series Nobody's Child: Suzu's Choice (テレビシリーズ 家なき子 〜すずの選択〜) is a CD-ROM-based FMV title for the Playdia console. It features Japanese actress Yumi Adachi (安達 祐実) from the 1994 television adaptation of Hector Malot's novels Sans Famille and En Famille.

external_ids.url: https://www.twitch.tv/directory/game/Ie Naki Ko - Suzu no Sentaku

name: Iest Dva Stula
summary:
Your character ended up in a prison cell with inveterate prisoners, and his task is to save his point by passing the test of riddles. Well, or become a rooster, no one forbids! Although this game is more of a prison survival where you have to save your point.
10 prison puzzles, up to 50 new puzzles in updates! For more realism, you won't be able to exit the game until you win!

name: I Expect You to Die 2
summary: Be the elite super spy we’ve been waiting for! The popular escape-the-room virtual reality franchise is back with new missions, more villains, and ingenious puzzles.

name: Iegami Nyoubou: Nanashi Nekomata wa KamiTuber
I Expect You to Die: Home Sweet Home
summary: Become a secret agent in your own living room in this short mixed reality mini-mission. You have been smuggled out of a top-secret medical facility to recover in the comfort of your home. Fitted with your new ocular implant, you will decipher puzzles, dodge dangerous threats, fight robotic hornets, and use spy gadgets galore. Dr. Zor has set a trap - right in your home! It is up to you to thwart those plans and save the day.

name: I Expect You to Die 3
summary: Outwit your most cunning adversary to date in the latest installment of this award-winning, spy-themed VR puzzle series. Wield new gadgets, visit action-packed locales, and wear custom disguises as you dive back into the world of espionage in this escape room game.
